item.description: This is a beautiful place with streams, beaver dam, and waterfall. Join us for a great day outdoors in the sunshine. Afterward, weâ€™ll go for lunch locally at a nice restaurant. For info, call Liz 860-582-1175. Directions to hike: I 84W Exit 38 (Rt. 6 Bristol), go about 6-7 miles (pass Home Depot, Stop & Shop, then Blockbuster), at RR tracks, turn right onto Burlington Ave. (Rt. 69) for 3.7 miles, turn left at the sign for Sessions Woods Wildlife Area. Go up hill, parking on left.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be waiting for you in the parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
